sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import s from './ProductDescription.module.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import Button from '../ReusableElements/Button/Button'; import { root_url } from '../../global' import { addProductToTotalCart } from '../../store/slices/cart_slice'; import Container from '../ReusableElements/Container/Container'; export default function ProductDescription(product_state) { const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(product_state.product[0].title) return (

{product_state.title}

${product_state.price}
{product_state.discont_price && product_state.discont_price}
-{Math.floor(product_state.price - (product_state.price * product_state.discont_price / 100))}%
) }
